raidNetwork.title: Pokebattler Raid Network
raidNetwork.subtitle: Join Remote Discord Raids
raidNetwork.description: Joining raids in the Pokebattler Raid Network is quick and easy! Simply join the raid and it will temporarily join you to the discord server, add you into the raid, and send you to the discord channel for communication with the host. You will automatically be removed from the server after some time by Discord itself.  Your spot in the raid will be saved for a short amount of time until you click to temporarily join the server in Discord
raidNetwork.description2: In order to use the network, you will need to enter your trainer name and friend code. This is shared with the discord bots to allow for raid coordination.
raidNetwork.description3: Discord Raids are created in either Pokenav or Nexus bots and are controlled by the server owners. These global raids are sent to the network after a delay, allowing users local on the server to join first.  You can join when the countdown timer hits 0 or the ‚è© button appears.
raidNetwork.description4: Pokebattler subscribers currently have a small head start for joining raids. Exact benefits for subscribers have not been finalized yet and are subject to change without notice
raidNetwork.joinDescription: Raid party within this app is coming soon but for now you can create raids in our discord by using the `$rr boss` command
raidNetwork.beConsiderate: Please be considerate of the servers you are joining and be on your best behavior! Abusive players, disorderly conduct and players who do not coordinate with the raid will be permanently banned from the raid network.

raidPartyHost.title: Raid Host
raidPartyHost.description: Send a friend invite to {{name}} in Pokemon Go
raidPartyHost.instructions: Share your raid party with your friends using the share icon in the top right. Global raid parties and the Pokebattler Raid Network are coming soon!

INTERESTED.hostDescription: Select whether you are local or remote

REMOTE.hostDescription: Send a friend invite to {{name}} in Pokemon Go

REMOTE_READY.hostDescription: Wait for the raid invite from {{name}} in Pokemon Go

errors.createRaidPartyGeneral: Raid party could not be created for {{raidPartyPokemon}}
errors.updateRaidPartyGeneral: Raid party could not be updated for {{raidPartyPokemon}}
errors.fetchRaidPartyGeneral: Raid party could not be found for {{raidPartyPokemon}}
errors.getRaidResultsGeneral: Raid results from party {{raidPartyId}} could not be retrieved

share.title: {{name}} #{{id}}
share.friendMessage: {{friendCode}} (Pastable Friend Code) - Join the $t(raids:tierList.{{tier}}.title) $t(constants:pokemon.{{defender}}) Raid Party #{{id}}.

noRaidParty.title: No Raid Parties Found
noRaidParty.description: Pokebattler Raid Parties are a quick and easy way to know whether you will beat a raid boss with your friends. You can create a raid party by selecting the blue plus button or from the raid counters by clicking on a raid and then clicking Join Raid Party

noFriendRaidParty.title: No Friend Raid Parties Found
noFriendRaidParty.description: Add your friends to Pokebattler Raid Party to know when your friends are raiding and quickly join their parties. Friends can be added on the Friend List or in raid party results.

noGlobalRaidParty.title: No Global Raid Parties Found
noGlobalRaidParty.description: No raids are currently available. Create your own for others to join

globalRaidList.title: Pokebattler Raid Network
globalRaidList.subtitle: Join Remote Raids from around the world! For Discord raids, you will be added to the raid and sent directly to the Discord channel to coordinate.

discord.joinToServerInfo: This raid requires you to join within discord. Please join the server, follow the welcome messages, then join the raid via the icons provided on the bot
discord.coordinateInChannel: This raid is coordinated in discord. Please communicate in the channel. Having trouble? Make sure your Discord is logged in with the same Discord account that you linked to this Pokebattler account.
